EmailTemplate.subject: RE: A 2013 MBO Associate (1356538042.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Michelle, So nice to meet you via email and thank you Heidi for all of your kind words! I hope you both a a lovely holiday. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to come in on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to our meeting! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Michelle Entrepreneur [mailto:michellelhaley@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, December 25, 2012 6:39 PM To: Heidi Everett Cc: Sara Conde Subject: Re: A 2013 MBO Associate Heidi, Thank you for your kind introduction. Sara, Looking forward to meeting you in the very near future to learn more about MBO. Happy holidays to you both! Best, M Sent from M's iPhone
